attributes.action: require bar workers to wear disposable gloves when serving customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: workers in the food industry already wear disposable gloves when serving / handling food. in bar work, the staff collect dirty glasses then serve a customer without washing their hands or wearing  protective gloves. this is not in line with health and safety practices and can lead to the spread of infections.
